text: Iraj Danaeifard (11 March 1951 – 12 December 2018) was an Iranian football player. He played most of his club career for Taj (currently Esteghlal) and his international career for Iran.Iraj Danaeifard. takhtejamshidcup.com He was born in Tehran. Danaeifard died on 12 December 2018 in Shiraz from a heart attack, aged 67.اولین گلزن ایران در جام جهانی درگذشت ==References== ==Other websites== * National Team Statistics * Interview with Irankicks.com * Tulsa Roughnecks stats Category:1951 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Iranian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Tehran
title: Iraj Danaeifard
